text: Hey, Alice, how did you get into tech? My background is a bit unconventional. I didn't study tech at a traditional university. I'm mostly self-taught and I took a lot of online courses. That's interesting. So you didn't attend a regular college or anything like that? No, not at all. I was at a different job, but I got really interested in programming and tech. So I started learning in my free time. That's impressive. Do you enjoy learning on your own? Absolutely. It was challenging, but I loved it. The flexibility of online learning allowed me to balance my job and my studies. Did you work on any projects during your self-study? Yes, I did. I built a few small web applications just to practice. It was a great way to apply what I learned. I admire your dedication. It's amazing how far you got studying by yourself.

dialogue.text: Hey, Alice, how did you get into tech?
My background is a bit unconventional.
I didn't study tech at a traditional university.
I'm mostly self-taught and I took a lot of online courses.
That's interesting.
So you didn't attend a regular college or anything like that?
No, not at all.
I was at a different job, but I got really interested in programming and tech.
So I started learning in my free time.
That's impressive.
Do you enjoy learning on your own?
Absolutely.
It was challenging, but I loved it.
The flexibility of online learning allowed me to balance my job and my studies.
Did you work on any projects during your self-study?
Yes, I did.
I built a few small web applications just to practice.
It was a great way to apply what I learned.
I admire your dedication.
It's amazing how far you got studying by yourself.
